description:
Chat Smith, developed on GPT-4o, DeepSeek-R1, Grok-2, and Gemini 1.5, delivers enhanced AI Chat app capabilities including deep research, voice interaction, writing emails, solving math homework, generating images, and offering an intelligent conversational experience for all your needs. Enjoy a personalized experience with AI Chatbot Chat Smith as your assistant on your iOS device.

Our AI assistant chatbot Chat Smith can do many tasks with endless possibilities:

GIVE INSTANT ANSWERS
Thanks to the latest AI model, Chat Smith gives impressive answers to any question using knowledge from top models like GPT-4o, Gemini, and more.

DEEP RESEARCH
Unlock deep insights with Pro Search and Deep Research. This guided AI search delivers accurate answers with sources and citations, offering advanced reasoning and detailed reports. Access real-time, updated data to explore complex topics effortlessly. Perfect for students, marketers, researchers, or anyone seeking truth beyond surface-level facts.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR
Convert your text into an image in seconds, or upload a photo and let Chat Smith transform it into a dreamy, hand-painted character. Instantly get Manga 2D, Genshin Impact, or Anime-style picturesâ€”and lead the social media trend!

AI WRITING ASSISTANT
+ Generate outlines or paragraphs for essays
+ Write anything: tweets, emails, blogs, SEO, ads, captions, and more
+ Turn product descriptions into ad copy or catchy product names

PDF MASTER
Summarize, rewrite, or translate any PDF document. Ask questions about the content and get instant answers.

YOUTUBE PRO
Paste any video URL to get summaries, rewrites, or translations of the content. Ask questions and get relevant insights.

AI KEYBOARD
Generate replies, improve grammar, and enhance writing without leaving your current app. Type smarter, faster, and more creatively.

PRACTICE ANY LANGUAGE
Translate standard English into any language using built-in multilingual capabilities. Perfect for travelers and language learners.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER
Quickly fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation mistakes in your writing.

EXPERT TEXT SUMMARIZER
Simplify long documents, meeting notes, or news articles into clear, concise summaries with key insights and smooth flow.

CODE GURU
Your coding copilot: generate, debug, or explain code in Python, JavaScript, HTML, and more. Ask coding questions or build simple apps using AI.

CV BUILDER
Generate a professional resume and cover letter. Optimize your LinkedIn profile or draft custom interview questions to help recruiters.

SPEECHWRITER & ANALOGY MAKER
Whether itâ€™s for a business meeting or school project, get help writing short speeches, analogies, or social media intros that connect emotionally.

STUDY ADVISOR
Give a topic and Chat Smith will create easy-to-remember study notes. Solve math homework, get writing help, or receive quiz prep support instantly.

You can choose to subscribe to our auto-renewing subscriptions:
â€¢ One week (USD $6.99), one month ($9.99), or one year ($39.99). After the free trial, the full amount will be charged to your iTunes Account. Subscription auto-renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the period ends. Unused trial portions are forfeited after purchase. Offers apply only to the first billing term. Manage your subscription in iTunes Account settings.

Weâ€™d love your feedback to improve the app.
